issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://checko.ru/company/bilayn-servis-1026301170708](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchecko.ru%2Fcompany%2Fbilayn-servis-1026301170708) ### Comment > Не работает блокировщик. На сайтах присутствует реклама, всплывающие окна, баннеры. Это происходит уже несколько дней. На одном из скриншотов видно, что блокировщик не обновляется и это тоже происходит уже не один день, фильтры не обвновляются, выпадает ошибка, и блокировщик ничего не фильтрует. И еще просьба «пнуть» службу поддержки VPN. Они просто игнорируют уже не один месяц! Так себе сервис для людей, которые покупают годовые подписки.. ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

comment.body:
> [@AdamWr](https://github.com/AdamWr) IIRC, several years ago you didn't actively hide copy buttons and sometimes even exempted (I mean `:not` alike and not `#@#`), but nowadays tend to hide? Was there a change in your mind or in our policy?

That's true, because I thought that it should not be hidden, but as I recall, I was told that we can hide these buttons if it's part of the element with share buttons. I guess that we do not need to do that if it's just separate button with different parent element/class/id.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: Fix #202207 viprow.nu
pull_request.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/202207

There's actually a script connection `https://lepomisprinted.shop/thRPFjI0rSrv5TNE/10879` which is blocked by

```adb
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z]{2}\.)?[0-9a-z]{5,16}\.[a-z]{3,7}\/[a-z](?=[a-z]{0,25}[0-9A-Z])[0-9a-zA-Z]{3,26}\/\d{4,6}(?:\?[_a-z]=[0-9a-z-]+)?$/$subdocument,script,xmlhttprequest,third-party,match-case
```

but I don't know if that rule works on reporter's browser (Chrome Mac)?

comment.body:
Not now. But your rule is also works. It has a wide selector, and may cause performance issues. When used `:contains()` better use more specific selectors, which match as few elements as possible.

It seems I forgot to add my rule when checked the old rules. Added now https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

pull_request.title: Fix #202207 viprow.nu
pull_request.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/202207

There's actually a script connection `https://lepomisprinted.shop/thRPFjI0rSrv5TNE/10879` which is blocked by

```adb
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z]{2}\.)?[0-9a-z]{5,16}\.[a-z]{3,7}\/[a-z](?=[a-z]{0,25}[0-9A-Z])[0-9a-zA-Z]{3,26}\/\d{4,6}(?:\?[_a-z]=[0-9a-z-]+)?$/$subdocument,script,xmlhttprequest,third-party,match-case
```

but I don't know if that rule works on reporter's browser (Chrome Mac)?

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

In most cases, they don't make much sense - they just copy the page address.
Less often the copied link contains some useful parameters (search filters, anchors).

comment.body:
У меня не повторяется. Попробуйте сбросить настройки Адгарда и проверить с дефолтными.
Для начала можно попробовать очистить пользовательский фильтр. Главное дождаться окончания конвертации правил и не переключаться на другие приложения в течение минуты, иначе iOS убьёт фоновый процесс Адгарда. Это же касается проверки обновлений фильтров.

pull_request.title: Fix #202207 viprow.nu
pull_request.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/202207

There's actually a script connection `https://lepomisprinted.shop/thRPFjI0rSrv5TNE/10879` which is blocked by

```adb
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z]{2}\.)?[0-9a-z]{5,16}\.[a-z]{3,7}\/[a-z](?=[a-z]{0,25}[0-9A-Z])[0-9a-zA-Z]{3,26}\/\d{4,6}(?:\?[_a-z]=[0-9a-z-]+)?$/$subdocument,script,xmlhttprequest,third-party,match-case
```

but I don't know if that rule works on reporter's browser (Chrome Mac)?

pull_request.title: Fix #202207 viprow.nu
pull_request.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/202207

There's actually a script connection `https://lepomisprinted.shop/thRPFjI0rSrv5TNE/10879` which is blocked by

```adb
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z]{2}\.)?[0-9a-z]{5,16}\.[a-z]{3,7}\/[a-z](?=[a-z]{0,25}[0-9A-Z])[0-9a-zA-Z]{3,26}\/\d{4,6}(?:\?[_a-z]=[0-9a-z-]+)?$/$subdocument,script,xmlhttprequest,third-party,match-case
```

but I don't know if that rule works on reporter's browser (Chrome Mac)?

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end. As I see, ad requests have been blocked. Please add these rules, clear app cache, restart it. Note that the rule with `graph.facebook.com` can't be added as the app has a `Facebook` login.
```adblock
||ad2.fivecdm.com^$app=works.jubilee.timetree
||graph.facebook.com^$app=works.jubilee.timetree
```
@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers please also take a look at this.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://ani.gamer.com.tw/animeVideo.php?sn=42920](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fani.gamer.com.tw%2FanimeVideo.php%3Fsn%3D42920) ### Comment > When Firefox released version 136, I updated it and opened the website https://ani.gamer.com.tw/ (if you want to watch the video, you need an ip from tw or hk) as usual, but I couldn't watch it. If you are not a member of the website, you need to watch a 30-second ad. It is normal that this ad cannot be blocked by the plug-in. I found that I couldn't load videos or even ads after turning on the plugin. I had to turn off the plugin to watch it normally as usual: watch a 30-second ad before starting the video, but now the ads have become very weird. In the past, they were just animated ads, but now there are all kinds of VPN ads. I'm scared. ### Screenshots

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> No longer works with Twitch. Page loads indefinitely. Disabling resolves the issue. AdGuard Extra DOES NOT resolve this issue. The only thing working is to disable AdGuard's regular extension.

Not reproduced. Is it related to enabled filters?

issue.title: Clean up obsolete rules for Dwango's fan club websites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

This commit added generic rules. 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7d1a9b151089796193632d1745a67d6fb0fe7929
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7f4d1402a090039d5f079630ab07a839d54efe76




### Proposed solution

Therefore, I believe the rules listed below can be removed. This is because these websites have the same or very similar structures, and I think they are now covered by the generic rules.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11430

issue.title: Clean up obsolete rules for Dwango's fan club websites
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

This commit added generic rules. 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7d1a9b151089796193632d1745a67d6fb0fe7929
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7f4d1402a090039d5f079630ab07a839d54efe76




### Proposed solution

Therefore, I believe the rules listed below can be removed. This is because these websites have the same or very similar structures, and I think they are now covered by the generic rules.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11430
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11431
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L2881
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L2882
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L4401


### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body: `#?#.MuiBox-root > div.MuiBox-root:has(> button.react-share__ShareButton)` is for the copy button. We can possibly add `##.react-share__ShareButton + .MuiIconButton-sizeLarge` if we are to hide these copy buttons.

issue.title: Clean up obsolete rules for Dwango's fan club websites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

This commit added generic rules. 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7d1a9b151089796193632d1745a67d6fb0fe7929
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7f4d1402a090039d5f079630ab07a839d54efe76




### Proposed solution

Therefore, I believe the rules listed below can be removed. This is because these websites have the same or very similar structures, and I think they are now covered by the generic rules.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11430
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11431
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L2881
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L2882
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L4401


### Additional information

_No response_

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

This commit added generic rules. 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7d1a9b151089796193632d1745a67d6fb0fe7929
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7f4d1402a090039d5f079630ab07a839d54efe76




### Proposed solution

Therefore, I believe the rules listed below can be removed. This is because these websites have the same or very similar structures, and I think they are now covered by the generic rules.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11430
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11431

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L4401

comment.body:
> Не работает блокировщик. На сайтах присутствует реклама, всплывающие окна, баннеры. Это происходит уже несколько дней. На одном из скриншотов видно, что блокировщик не обновляется и это тоже происходит уже не один день, фильтры не обвновляются, выпадает ошибка, и блокировщик ничего не фильтрует.

Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

> И еще просьба «пнуть» службу поддержки VPN. Они просто игнорируют уже не один месяц! Так себе сервис для людей, которые покупают годовые подписки..

без номера обращения не смогу.

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

This commit added generic rules. 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7d1a9b151089796193632d1745a67d6fb0fe7929
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7f4d1402a090039d5f079630ab07a839d54efe76




### Proposed solution

Therefore, I believe the rules listed below can be removed. This is because these websites have the same or very similar structures, and I think they are now covered by the generic rules.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11430

_No response_

comment.body:
Добавьте в пользовательский фильтр это правило
`comss.ru##body`
Оно скрывает содержимое. Проверьте в обычной и в приватной вкладке, видно ли содержимое при обновлении страницы и переходах.
После проверки удалите.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

pbs.org

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When having AdGuard for Android TV (v4.8) running with the basic ad blocking, tracker blocker, and AdGuard default DNS protection enabled (and no custom user rules active) the PBS Android TV app is unable to play videos due to the pre-video advertisement being blocked not allowing the video the play. If I disable protection for the PBS app within AdGuard's settings, video playback works as expected.

issue.body:
**Attention:**
If you encounter an ad blocker detection - please enable the pop-up filter in the Annoyances section. Or add the following rules to `User rules`:

```adblock
||securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=tradingview.com,important
tradingview.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'doubleclick.net')
```

If you encounter any other problem - continue creating the report.

---

**Внимание:**
Если вы столкнулись с обнаружением блокировщика рекламы - включите фильтр всплывающих окон в разделе Раздражителей. Либо добавьте следующие правила в пользовательский фильтр:

```adblock
||securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=tradingview.com,important
tradingview.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'doubleclick.net')
```

Если вы столкнулись с любой другой проблемой - продолжите создание отчёта.

comment.body:
> The website works fine on my end. Please check it only with these filters.
> 
> ```
> AdGuard Base
> AdGuard URL Tracking
> AdGuard Tracking Protection
> AdGuard Social Media
> AdGuard Cookie Notices
> AdGuard Popups
> AdGuard Mobile App Banners
> AdGuard Other Annoyances
> AdGuard Widgets
> AdGuard Chinese
> ```

我发现是什么问题了，是ublock origin 恶意软件风险过滤器中的规则导致的 。就是这条规则  `||staticfile.org^$all`

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/298bfe9d-241d-4a0e-ae5d-75d2acc634c3)
但我添加下面这条规则后就正常了
`@@||cdn.staticfile.org/twitter-bootstrap/4.3.1/css/bootstrap.min.css$domain=ip.900cha.com`

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/639cc962-22ec-46c4-b46f-da4e0503787c)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/58eff349-7c40-4cb9-b15d-42ef3fd0a086)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5e387bd6-cde7-4813-9f3d-cb60d7b638ac)

issue.title: Clean up obsolete rules for Dwango's fan club websites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

This commit added generic rules. 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7d1a9b151089796193632d1745a67d6fb0fe7929
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7f4d1402a090039d5f079630ab07a839d54efe76




### Proposed solution

Therefore, I believe the rules listed below can be removed. This is because these websites have the same or very similar structures, and I think they are now covered by the generic rules.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11430
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L11431
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L2881
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L2882
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/4d67f86f75493c55b2de4118604cf04f342492ab/SocialFilter/sections/specific.txt#L4401

_No response_

comment.body:
> 广告占位符已修复。没有看到任何广告拦截。请将 adblock 消息的确切文本写入 report。

你好，你们不懂中文，所以无法发现这个网站在阻止广告过滤插件。下面这段话是提示信息，你们可以翻译成英文。当关闭Adguard，则不会出现这段话。

`更多内容加载中…请稍候…
本站只支持手机浏览器访问，若您看到此段落，代表章节内容加载失败◇请关闭浏览器的阅读模式、畅读模式、小说模式，以及关闭广告屏蔽功能，或复制网址到其他浏览器阅读！`

For now you can keep your rule or disable the filter until it's fixed.
Just in case, I'd change it up a bit.
```adblock
@@||cdn.staticfile.org/twitter-bootstrap/*/css/bootstrap.min.css$domain=ip.900cha.com
```

comment.body:
这个issues是我提交的。抱歉，出了点问题，我搞错了规则。
应该修改成
`||banzhu*.com/js/cdn.js`
`||banzhu*.com/js/html`

不过我有个请求，就是我希望能改成
`||banzhu*/js/html`
`||banzhu*/js/cdn.js`
因为这个域名会不断变化，只有 `banzhu`是会一直不变的，后面的数字是会不断变化的，而且有两种后缀名，一个是com，一个是net。所以我觉得使用通配符会好一些

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: Exclude `dictionary.telemetry.mozilla.org`
pull_request.body:
Documentation domain

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report; (it kinda is)
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [x] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.
## What issue is being fixed?
Broken site.

<!--
### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<Please write a comment here>

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<paste screenshot here>

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<paste screenshot here>

</details>

-->

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

pull_request.title: Exclude `dictionary.telemetry.mozilla.org`
pull_request.body:
Documentation domain

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report; (it kinda is)
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [x] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.
## What issue is being fixed?
Broken site.

<!--
### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<Please write a comment here>

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<paste screenshot here>

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<paste screenshot here>

</details>

-->

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
这个issues是我提交的。抱歉，出了点问题，我搞错了规则。
应该修改成
`||banzhu*.com/js/cdn.js`
`||banzhu*.com/js/html`

不过我有个请求，就是我希望能改成
`||banzhu*/js/html`
`||banzhu*/js/cdn.js`
因为这个域名会不断变化，只有 `banzhu`是会一直不变的，后面的数字是会不断变化的，而且有两种后缀名，一个是com，一个是net。所以我觉得使用通配符会好一些
